app.title: LocalMedScan
app.subtitle: Offline AI Medical Screening
disclaimer.banner: This is a screening aid, NOT a diagnostic tool. Always consult a qualified healthcare professional.
disclaimer.full: IMPORTANT: This application is a screening aid only. It is NOT a medical device and is NOT intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Results should ALWAYS be reviewed by a qualified healthcare professional. Do not make medical decisions based solely on this tool's output. If you have a medical emergency, contact your local emergency services immediately.
disclaimer.accept_checkbox: I understand this is a screening aid only and will always consult a healthcare professional for diagnosis.
malaria.title: Malaria Parasite Detection
malaria.subtitle: Screen blood smear microscopy images for malaria parasites. Uses MobileNetV2 trained on the NIH Malaria Dataset with 95-97% proven accuracy. Drop a blood smear image below to begin.
malaria.drop_text: Drop blood smear image here or click to browse
malaria.result_positive_desc: The AI model detected patterns consistent with malaria parasites in this blood smear cell image. Please confirm with microscopy by a trained laboratory technician.
malaria.result_negative_desc: The AI model did not detect patterns consistent with malaria parasites in this blood smear cell image. If clinical suspicion remains, please repeat the test or consult a specialist.
malaria.accuracy_note: Model accuracy: 95-97% on NIH Malaria Dataset (27,558 images). False positives and false negatives can occur.
xray.title: TB / Pneumonia Screening
xray.subtitle: Screen chest X-ray images for tuberculosis, pneumonia, and 12 other conditions. Uses DenseNet121 trained on NIH + CheXpert + MIMIC-CXR datasets. Drop an image below to begin.
xray.drop_text: Drop chest X-ray image here or click to browse
xray.no_findings: No significant findings detected above the confidence threshold.
skin.title: Skin Lesion Screening
skin.subtitle: Screen skin lesion images for classification. Upload a clear, well-lit photo of the skin area.
skin.coming_soon_desc: Skin lesion screening will be available in a future update. This module will classify skin lesions across 7 categories using AI analysis.
eye.title: Eye / Retina Screening
eye.subtitle: Screen retinal fundus images for diabetic retinopathy severity grading.
eye.coming_soon_desc: Diabetic retinopathy screening will be available in a future update. This module will grade retinal images on a 5-level severity scale.
history.title: Screening History
history.subtitle: Browse your past screenings. All data is stored locally on your device.
history.empty: No screenings yet. Analyze a medical image to see it here.
history.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all screening history? This cannot be undone.
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure LocalMedScan preferences.
settings.language_restart: Language change takes effect after restart.
results.title: Screening Results
results.heatmap_desc: Areas highlighted by the AI model during analysis. Brighter regions indicate higher attention.
validation.unsupported_format: Unsupported image format: {ext}. Supported: JPEG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, DICOM.
validation.cannot_read_image: Cannot read image file. It may be corrupted.
onboarding.welcome_text: LocalMedScan is a free, offline AI screening assistant that helps analyze medical images. All processing happens locally on your device.
onboarding.privacy_text: LocalMedScan processes all images 100% locally on your device. No images or data are ever uploaded to any server. No account is required. No telemetry is collected.
onboarding.model_text: LocalMedScan requires a one-time download of AI models (~50 MB). After downloading, the app works completely offline.
about.title: About LocalMedScan
about.description: Free, offline AI medical image screening assistant.
about.mission: AI Should Be Free. AI Should Be Private. AI Should Be Yours.
